articles.description: South Africa were folded for just 116 runs in 27.3 overs in its eight-wicket loss to India in the opening ODI game of the series. | Cricket
articles.content: To say South Africa were hammered would be an understatement of what unfolded in Johannesburg on Sunday evening in the opening ODI game of the three-match series. South Africa had more of their white… [+4421 chars]
